article_metadata.description: In Monday's Analysts' Actions, Oracle (ORCL) was hit with a downgrade at one Wall Street firm and analysts made some negative comments on 3D Systems (DDD) and Honeywell (HON).
article_metadata.author: U-Jin Lee
